verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stand <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> shall <S%G1089><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> , till <S%G2193%G302><s%> they have seen <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> .
